alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 20 at 9:28PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Halstad affecting Norman and Traill Counties. Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. .Snow melt has contributed to river rises. Minor to moderate flooding is expected over the next 7 days for these sites. For the Red River...including Wahpeton, Hickson, Fargo, Halstad, East Grand Forks, Oslo, Drayton, Pembina...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Wild Rice River (MN)...including Twin Valley, Hendrum... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Sheyenne River...including Valley City, Lisbon, Kindred, West Fargo, Harwood...Moderate flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 23.0 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
